Name: Core Passive: Nitro-Fuel Cocktail
Additional Ability: Fire Kindling
Descriptions:
When Burnice expends Energy, she accumulates <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>, up to a max of 100. She gains 1.4 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> for each 1 point of Energy spent. At 50 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>, she enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state until all <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> is expended. On entering the battlefield, Burnice instantly accumulates 100 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state, when Burnice hits an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Scorched</color> effect to the target until she exits the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state. When other squad members hit enemies under the <color=#FFFFFF>Scorched</color> status, it triggers the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect, expending 8 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> to deal <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>175%</color> of Burnice's ATK and accumulate <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color>. This effect can trigger once every 1.5s. 
Every 10 Anomaly Proficiency increases <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> DMG by <color=#2BAD00>1%</color>, up to a max of 30%. DMG from the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is considered <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</color> DMG.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character or shares the same Faction:
When Burnice's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color> hits an enemy, or when the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is triggered, the move's accumulated <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color> increases by 65%.  When any team member applies the <color=#FF5521>Burn</color> effect to the enemy, the duration of that effect is extended by 3s.

Cons.Name: Kindred Flames
Cons.Effect: Increases the limit of <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> from 100 to 140. Upon entering the battlefield, Burnice accumulates an additional 40 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>. Increases the DMG Multiplier of the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect by 100% of Burnice's ATK. Additionally, the accumulated <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color> from the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is increased by 25%.

Cons.Name: Extra at No Additional Charge
Cons.Effect: When triggering the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect, <color=#FFFFFF>Thermal Penetration</color> is applied to the enemy, stacking up to 5 times and lasting 6s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When any allied unit in the squad hits the enemy, the attack's PEN Ratio is increased by 4% for each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Thermal Penetration</color>, up to a max of 20%.

Cons.Name: Ultimate Fuel Supply
Cons.Effect: Upon using <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>, Burnice generates 30 Energy. This effect can trigger once every {EXCEL:1}s. The max flamethrower duration of <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color> is increased by 1s.

Cons.Name: Burning Invitation
Cons.Effect: When Burnice hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>, it triggers a special <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect, dealing 60% of Burnice's ATK. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s and does not consume <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>. Both <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect ignore25% of the target's <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color>.
